properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 6:44PM CST until January 11 at 9:11AM CST by NWS Fort Worth TX
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a Flood
Warning for the following areas in Texas...

West Fork Trinity River Near Boyd Affecting Wise County
Elm Fork Trinity River At Gainesville Affecting Cooke County

The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a

* Flood Warning for
The Elm Fork Trinity River At Gainesville.
* until Saturday morning...Or until the warning is cancelled.
* At 0615 PM Friday the stage was 19.54 feet.
* Flood stage is 22.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river should rise above flood stage by Friday
evening and continue to rise to a crest near  22 feet by Friday
evening. The river should fall below flood stage by Friday night.
* At 22 feet, Minor out of bank flooding will occur.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.
Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
Stay tuned to NOAA All Hazards Radio for the latest river forecasts.
